Posts.Content: Had my second FEC chemo on wednesday and my taste buds have gone mad. I need to drink and try and flush this stuff through but everything I drink tastes of metal and I'm really having difficulty finding anything palatable. Does anyone have any ideas please?
Posts.Title: What to drink?

Posts.Content: Had my 2nd FEC last wed and used cold cap with the first, almost no har left now, extremely thin and dead looking so will take it off over the next few days. It's the fatigue that has really got to me over the last few days, I really didn't think it would be quite like this.
Posts.Title: FEC and hair loss
